place_description: Counter-serve bakery/cafe chain serving sandwiches, salads & more, known for its bread & free WiFi.

reviews_data.review_text: Shockingly slow service.  Ordered and waited 26 minutes for food to be made.
Food is good portions are small for the price. But with inflation today, what is one to expect?

I recently visited this Panera location and ordered the broccoli cheese soup. Unfortunately my experience was far from pleasant. The soup had a strange smell, reminiscent of baby formula, which should have been a red flag. Despite my initial hesitation, I ate some anyway and regretted it soon after. The aftertaste was overpowering, and I ended up with awful baby formula burps. To make matters worse, I felt so nauseous that I actually ended up throwing up shortly afterwards. This was a highly disappointing experience, and I hope management addresses this issue promptly.
Solid Panera location. The dining room is a little smaller than most (I think) but all in all they're friendly and quick.
Love Panera Breads all around. I have been to this branch many times and it is my default go to place for coffee or meals
Good place, one of the better paneras in Charlotte. I definitely recommend this one..
The food was delicious, I ordered a 1/2 southwest salad by accident and I liked it a lot, much better than I was expecting.
Wonderful atmosphere and customer service.  Excellent coffee.  Very clean and well maintained.

The broccoli cheddar soup is the only reason to go here anymore. They've gotten lazy with the food by lowering portion sizes, putting together sloppy sandwiches with low quality meat, and skipping basic steps, while also raising prices through the roof. If I'm paying almost $30 for a bowl of soup and a full sandwich, I at least expect the sandwich to be cut in half correctly but apparently that's asking too much at this point.
Love me some Panera Bread!!!
Took forever to make to come home to the wrong sandwich

My office is close to this Panera location, so I frequent the restaurant a lot in the mornings prior to work. I really enjoy the Egg Souffles. But, my favorite things about Panera mornings are ordering and talking with Devin who is the cashier there. Devin is kind, and efficient especially during the mornings in which there is a long line. Every guest's order is completed with speed and quality. With the great cook staff at this location, Devin is especially memorable to me as she always notices and recognizes me. She is sure to remember my order, and is pleasant in disposition despite the early morning.

Food is hit or miss at this location and the one in Cotswold. Just came to ask if it's just me whose order is messed up every time I don't tip? I've noticed that more & more. I'd stopped tipping because my order was frequently wrong or not as requested. For example, a green goddess salad w/no chicken. Just a bunch of greens. Then I'd be mad that I'd left a tip. So I stopped for two reasons. 1) I eat there multiple times during the week bfast/lunch and 2) the probability that my order will be correct is pretty low. I'd usually have returned to work so my only recourse was to write corporate which made it right, but that's such an inconvenience. I ordered a sandwich from the Fairview Rd location yesterday after taking a break from them where I requested no mayo and sure enough it was slathered in mayo when I got it home. You'd think I'd wise up and check before I leave the store but nope. Got all the way home to discover it had mayo. Of course, I hadn't tipped either & likely won't again. Do better and you'll get tipped. You don't deserve a tip for almost getting it right or because you showed up. Panera ain't that cheap first of all particularly for those of us who order multiple times a day/week.

The tables are clean and overall is soo clean
Good customer service too

Best soup ever
Lovely staff
I came for bread bowel as this place well known for bread. They had sour dough bread which is nice. Would love to try something else next time.
The parking areas are small and no room

I come to this place often and always notice they don't keep their tables clean and ready for the next guest. Today we had to ask an employee to come clean the table! All of the tables had crumbs of food from the previous guest... They should do better at keeping this place clean, especially in the  South Park area!
The salad was ok. Mostly lettuce. Could have had more of everything, including dressing. Waited a long time for just a salad.
This location was so clean!! The service was very good. The drink dispensers were filled and drinks were cold. The atmosphere was amazing.
Would have ranked all 5 stars but they're only giving 4 star service and food

The bagel was good. Gave a 1 star based on the service received from one employee working behind the counter prepping food. I ordered a cinnamon crunch began online. Went to the pick up counter get the befall. Asked the nice gentleman behind the counter if I could have a extra cream cheese (I'm well aware of the up charge) He handed it to me and the lady beside him says "It's a up charge" - I said okay. She repeated again I told her I'm aware ma'am and proceeded to the counter to pay. I got to the counter and the gentleman that gave me the cream cheese appears acting as if he's looking for something. I asked him if he was sent by the lady to make sure I paid. I could tell by the look on his face he was. I felt humiliated. I asked to speak with a manager. Gave my experience and probably will not come back to this location.

I've been coming to this Panera for a very long time when I come from out of town every month.  This one struggled for a while and the service was terrible but they finally got it turned around only to have a car drive through their window.  I updated their hours because it wasn't correct on this website and the last time I went they've definitely are back on track as far as quality and service goes.
Closed, but does not say so on Google Maps or on the app when ordering.
Super quiet for a Saturday morning. Food was perfect. Dining room tables needed some TLC
Walked from the nearby hotel. They shut and lock the doors 10 minutes before closing and I could not purchase a drink because they "locked the doors". Change the hours to 4:50  if that's the case.

I'll give the five stars once they have bagels in stocks. Every weekend my family and I look forward to eating bagels it's out treat. It doesn't matter how early you go they are out of stock of something. Management should do better in ordering inventory. It's disgraceful at this point!
The employees and food were both just so amazing... one of the best Panera's I've been too

My visit was delightful.  Devin waited on me, and was absolutely, and completely accommodating to an old guy - myself.  I had no idea where I was supposed to go to order,  yet she didn't treat me like an idiot.  Rather, her generous and patient spirit guided me through the process without the slightest bit of sarcasm or disdain.

For a first times visitor it's a bit difficult to find  ... but definitely worth the effort.

What is the atmosphere option thing?
Anyways the food was Great  and the pizza was delicious  Very nice place to eat!

I am a regular customer of the franchise location cafe #601218 of Panera Bread located at 5940 Fairview Rd, Charlotte  NC. Today will be my last visit here as I was very disappointed the way things were handled by the Store Manager, Jasmine. When I left the location after eat-in around 9:15pm after it was closed at 9pm, all the left over breads and other bakery items were placed in a box for a donation or throw-away. Earlier I wanted to purchase Tomato Basil Miche loaf of bread, regularly sold for $8.19 plus Tax. The customer service rep offered me to sell it for $5. She took out loaf of bread from the bottom of the box and while ringing, the Store Manager, Jasmine came to close the register and made customer service rep to charge me full price of $8.78. I was very disappointed. When I asked customer service rep about her words of $5 deal (after Jasmine left), she mentioned to me that she was to offer me a loaf for $5 but suddenly Store Manager showed-up so customer service rep was helpless. So basically Store Manager charged me full price of the perishable item which was supposed to be discarded or donated !! Can you imagine how smart Panera Bread is hiring their Store Manager??? Also to add on, I had ordered a bowl of Soup among other items and the soup was cold. When I mentioned to chef on duty who made my full order of sandwich, he told me that I have to warm it up on my own in Microwave somewhere in Panera Bread cafe!!
I like this location and the food is always good. The kiosks make it easier to order.
They stop serving breakfast at 11 but have almost no bagels left at 10:45.
Hey, we should be thankful for Panera bread, the urban citizens go-to in bas-relief to Macdonald/BurgerKing/Wendy's/TacoBell eat-and-get-out joints.

Panera is Awesome! I never visit a location that um not impressed with! Always Fresh and delicious!
Employees are always helpful and welcoming!
The team running this place just doesn't care. Orders are wrong, place is dirty, food is shady.
Quick service one of my favourite sandwiches
Sad that I can't place anymore pick up orders until July. Their non-inclusive Flag is offensive and disrespectful to most of their customers.
I don't know what's so hard about this: if my food isn't ready, don't send me a text and a notification telling me that my food is ready
Standard.
Standard Panera. Staff was friendly.

I was not there very long for I met a Match date there. Clean and accommodating restaurant with a limited menu. They ran out of coffees, except for hazelnut. I got almost a cup full as it dripped it's last drops. Employees were very nice.
Won't return
The soups are really good.
We ordered chicken sandwiches, one with an apple, one with potato chips.  They were ready quickly, and were good and hot. Restroom was good. Parking lot was smallish, but easy to get in and out of.
Highly recommend!
WAIT TIME FOR DOORDASH ORDERS IS SUPER LONG.
Friendly staff, but the place could use some cleaning.
The service was great she gave me a free drink cause it was my first time eating there she was so awesome an food was delicious
The Clean, Calm, and Comfortable Atmosphere always gets you on a higher level of happiness. And so does the food, Chicken Noodle Soup and Tomato Soup never goes wrong!
Why keep the chicken Chipotle on the menu? You NEVER have the foccia bread
It's Panera Bread..  Alot Laptops Pervs  lurking in corners and food is ok.. but some odd reason..you crave it food and it calls upon you at 3 AM...

Ugh.... awful. I have been coming here a couple of times per week in the past 6 months. Only one human taking orders/helping customers while six others are milling about behind the cash registers ignoring the line. The line keeps growing, and then that only human screams at all of us "y'all can order from the kiosk". No thank you. Not until all of us there to spend money start grumbling, does a second human open a cash register. This is awful customer service, and zero business sense.... I am going elsewhere.

Shame that this business has really gone downhill. Hardly any staff working and they aren't very friendly. My egg souffle was burned and the coffee urns are always empty, and then you can't find anyone to replace them. $3 for a large coffee that is considerably smaller than the old large which was $2. It's just not worth it anymore when it's self serve and most of the time, you're waiting on them to bring out more coffee.

Excellent service, friendly staff
Very good morning coffee and breakfast bagel is always good
To start every day morning.
Keep up the great service to keep customers feel at home.
Delicious breakfast
The soup is so bad the soup look like a water

One of my favorite places to go!! I love the Broccoli cheddar soup!! Very creamy and tasty! Caring employees following rules in this crazy times of pandemics!! Food haven't changed a bit!! Still great i added to my menu a turkey avocado blt to go with my soup!!
Lacking in cleanliness.  Every table was dirty, I had to wipe our table down. No one seemed to care.

Panera bread has some of the best bagels we've ever had. Especially the Asiago bagels. All the workers are really nice and we appreciate them being their so early in the morning.
Unfortunately I don't have anything nice to say about their cream cheese. I got the cream cheese for the first time today, for $1.00 for 1 ounce cup. It was disgusting! It was slimey and sticky, it tasted terrible and it smells bad. By the 3rd bite of the bagel, I almost threw up. I wasted an entire Asiago bagels.
I have never had cream that was like that.
I do recommend this business. There other food items are good too. Just don't get the cream cheese.

This is the slowest most pathetic restaurant in the area. There is no management,  leadership, or willingness to attempt to provide food in a timely manner.

There are many other options in the area. Avoid at all cost.
I was in from DC for a few days and appreciated the consistency and familiarity of Panera. I had a great experience here for lunch. Very fresh ingredients and nice service.

Parking is a bit of a pain but I've never had to wait more than a few minutes to find a spot.  Sometimes they have a security guard out directing traffic to help out.  I always love the u pick 2.  Broccoli and cheddar soup with chicken Cesar salad is a great combo.
Update: ordered and delivered but they forgot my baguette!   Noooooo!  Sure would go nice with my broccoli and cheddar soup.  that's as bad a Jimmy John's forgetting the meat on my sandwich  last week!  Haha!  This is Panera BREAD !
Visited here twice for curbside and the first time I had to go in to get my order and second time they brought the wrong order out.
Panera never disappoints! Food was fresh and tasted great! Order was accurate. Staff was friendly. They also had a spot decorated for Pride which was extremely inviting and thoughtful. Great place!

Provide worst service in last visit, I ordered the Pizza , they took the order , I paid for the order as well, after 15-20 mins waiting the restaurant girl said , we can not provide pizza order ,we can not take it out from Freezer , please order something else. This was happened second time, worst service provided at Fairview road ,Simpsonville ,SC branch.

This is where I get my coffee or drink every day. Parking would be the biggest issue here, since there are not many spots available and is shared with a couple of other businesses including an AT&T store.
The staff is loud when they are having their conversations but their very polite and try to have meaningful conversations with you as you wait for your order. There's a nice outdoor space where the sunshine doesn't scorch you while you eat. Traffic noise is an issue but hardly noticeable indoors.
It's a nice place to take a long walk to since it is about a 10 minute walk from everything else, but it is very nice at sunset.

Love Panera and go to this location often but my last experience there was baffling. Woman behind the front counter saw me standing there waiting for her to finish with her current customer, but walked away as soon as she was done, then ignored me at the expo window. I finally loudly told her that I didn't get the cup for a drink with my order and she just pointed at them in the window and said they're self-serve. I've never had to grab my own cup out of the expo window, especially since the pickup shelf is on the other side of the store. Just very odd and rude interaction. Otherwise, the food was ready on time and delicious!

Ordered To Go and it would have been nice to have our sandwiches labeled.  Requested that the bagels be sliced, toasted and add butter, and while butter was provided in the bag, we did not receive enough butter for all three bagels and the bagels were dry.  Rest of the order was okay and enjoyed the iced chai tea latte.  Okay overall.
Ordered 15 lunches for the office. Order was ready before time selected and all orders were correct. Ladies were awesome in helping me with the order!!
This is the slowest panera bread ever,  totally disorganized and under staffed. Corporate needs to come in and help this store.
Great service clean and friendly. Will return again
One of the better locations, only issue here is usually parking.
Clean and quick location.
My food was Great as always ad the young lady at the register was SO sweet..
Nice, but smaller Panera. I guess I've been spoiled with their amazing options at their large locations.

I love Panera. My favorite place to eat while getting some work done or meeting with business partners. I just hope they put the regular milk back by the coffee dispensers. It is annoying to have to go to the counter, explain that I do not drink almond milk, skim milk or half and half and beg the person behind the counter who need to go look for a manager before they give me some drops of milk to which I had to respond .. Pleeeeeeeease give me some more milk I like my coffee with God made milk from the cow and not some man made altered juice. PLEASE PUT THE MILK BACK. It is coffee with milk in English and Cafe au lait in French.
THIS PLACE CONSISTENTLY SERVES VERY GOOD FRESH FOOD.

The cookies and sandwiches were made very well. The employees and management are very nice and hospitable. They do need to work on labeling the To-Go sandwiches. Not a single one of the 3 sandwiches were labeled, which is unsanitary when having to open up each sandwich to see who's is who's.
Just what I needed that moment!

Larger bowl or smaller ladle???
Half bowl had almost as much soup.
The South Park Panera is awesome.  We ordered close to closing time and they still filled out pick up order.  Thank you Panera!
Panera bread interior design always feels so outdated.

My wife and I ate at Panera on Fairview Rd last night. The food was great and the portions were just right for a late supper. We are pleased to be able to eat there inside again.

UPDATE, 01-04-2022:  Hours, dine-in availability and food selections may vary due to staffing, supply chain and COVID-19 issues. Curbside pick-up is available.  Parking is a bit tight.  Please tip!
I'm not sure why but my last few evening experiences at Panera weren't what I am used to. I guess everyone was tired and ready to go home. Can't blame them.
Good for what it intends to be, especially during pandemic staffing shortages.

6.00 for a small soup and 7.00 for a half sandwich with little steak, no cheddar cheese and horrible tasting onions. You have to get your own food and drink and they push for a tip at checkout. Overall experience was not good. No return for me.

Consistent customer service problems.  Good luck if you have an issue, they won't answer their phone and no other way to contact.  Time estimates are aspirational at best and you should be prepared for a 30-minute wait past your expected time.
Great customer service
Picked up breakfast
Really good food and good coffee and cappuccino to be there for a good time
food tastless
Clean and good food and service.
Love their colombian coffee
Good service, but ice cold oatmeal!
Awesome lunch.... had a Flatbread Pizza and cup of Broccoli and Cheese soup!
I placed an online order with very specific directions and they followed them to the "T". Plus, the portions were FRESH and not skimpy. Yay them! Yay me!
As busy as this place gets at lunch, the staff ran that place like a fine oiled machine! Almost like clockwork! Impressive lunch staff, esp the girl with mermaid colored hair!
Authentic Indian food. Great quality. Reasonable prices. Friendly service. Recommended.
Soup cheddar broccoli very good

I was kinda blown away by how awesome the service was here. I was picking up some orders that my girlfriend was placing online. I was given a coffee cup almost immediately and the flatbread pizza came out super fast plus it was delicious. There was one particular gentleman that was so awesomely helpful that it made my night. I don't know if he was a manager or not but I am definitely coming back. Seriously awesome service.
Terrible service crazy long wait even though they were not busy
Not crowded oh, so service was fairly quick. Food was good.
Absolutely Delicious Chipotle Chicken and Egg Wrap.
I went inside for the first time in 15 months! The usual pleasant greetings, but mostly new workers. (Might have been time of day.) Spotless, soup hot enough to take home and still hot.) Ahhh.
Love theirs  soups

I have ordered from work, to be delivered twice now and the DOOR DASH person just left food at wrong building first time, with no human. Someone found it and it was freezing. And this time he called me ...I couldn't answer the phone...called back a bunch of times , no answer. Text. nothing. Asked where my food was. Nothing. Then he blocked me...UGH!! Door Dash is awful....I don't know why you continue to use them. Panera was great about reimbursing me.

Disgusting chicken barbecue sandwich with skin, chicken fat and gristle. Never again!
Did not have several ordered items as they were ordered and paid for on-line for curbside
pick-up and did not have suitable substitute items.  Quality has gone way down.
Great place. Very good food and service. Love the coffee plan.

Pretty disappointed in the curbside pickup today. I placed my order 40 minutes before getting there to pick up. 5 minutes before my pickup time I got the text saying my order was ready....arrived on time and relayed that I was there. After waiting 10 minutes for an order that was ready I called to check on it with no answer. So I had to grab my child and go inside to grab my order that was sitting on the counter where food was being made. As I was leaving, the women behind me waiting (who had been there longer than me) was also grabbing her baby out of the car to go inside to get her curbside order. I know you were busy, but it looked as if curbside orders were just being ignored.

I love Panera and hadn't been in quite some time. I ordered online for pick up and everything was fresh, accurate and delicious-5 * there, always! But be aware (as this store wasn't familiar to me either) there are two places for food to be 'found'. Online orders completed are on a separate wall facing the kitchen. Again all was delicious!!

Fantastic customer service. From management and there team. I have been a Panera bread customers forever. I have never seen customer service like this before.  I work down the street. I ordered  online in different store because I live up north.  They couldn't find my order. So they made my food and just gave it to me they said you can cancel and order it on your app again.. I was shocked they trusted me.  Now that is customer service !!!!! Thank you so much for the excellent service!!!
Took over 2 hours for my salad to be delivered
Had a good experience with my children we enjoyed a meal on the patio
Love the new Teriyaki Chicken and Broccoli Bowl!
Excellent Service and was grateful to have a nice place to enjoy coffee and dine in while working.  Ample room and plugs available.  Will remember this as Starbucks is pick up only during Covid.
Excellent!!
Manager is great. Really took charge and corrected an issue that I had with a employee who was misinformed.
Good
More cleaning needed in between costumer seating. Hope not to see crumbs and slimes next time.
Me encanta
Great cool vibe staff friendly

The food is good but every time I order there is at least 1 item missing. The person at the pickup counter is supposed to look at everything in the order and check off on the receipt that it's in the bag. They are just being lazy and not actually checking every item and just trusting the person who bagged it. It's frustrating coming back to get it fixed so make sure to check before you leave. Also for some reason if you get the bagel pick they put the cream cheese under all of the bagels? So that's annoying.

Y'all have to try this pizza! Big and tasty !

It has sitting inside or outside, with handicap access and fire pit as well. Clean and fast. Nice experience!
Missing the bread from my daughter's meal, and then she finds hair in her mac and cheese. Tried to call but no one answers the phones.

The worst Panera store! Orders are always missing items that you have paid for.  Four orders in a row now have been incorrect - missing entire salads, drinks, cookies, etc.  The worst part is no one ever answers the phone when you call to get a refund for missing items.

The pickup area has terrible service. I have been in several times and everytime they rude. The do not greet customers as the come up. Their keep backs turned and never ask once if they can help you. When you get their attention they treat you like your intruping whatever they are doing. I finally writing a review because today I waited 15 mins for my order. I was told they had redo because the kitchen misplaced the order. Even as I waited my order was put behind the others even though it was their mistake. I feel that I'm profiled because I'm not the "correct type of person " to be ordering. I will not be visiting  this location again due this unacceptable behavior.
This was the worst visit that I have ever had to panera bread I will not use this location again
Always great I love it
Great service and good  food
Had one of the new small Duet.  Very good and a nice value.  Had a early lunch at 11:30 am and it was very quite for a Saturday.  Had a nice quite meal with the family.

Social distancing is being practiced inside. But there is no precautions taken on the outside patio and there is no sanitation happening on the outside patio as we observed spider webs on chairs and dirty tablea
Food was fantastic. Employees were super helpful

Panera Bread cheats when it comes to their Bowls of soup.
8/20/2020 paid for bowl of french onion soup. The girl did not ask if I wanted it in a bread bowl which I did. it was take out. I was told if I want it in a bread bowl it will cost $2.40 extra, now on the menu the difference in a Bowl and bread bowl is .10 cents. The manager told me when you order the bread bowl its a cup size, though your paying for a Bowl....Wow and since I already paid for the Bowl I need to return the bowl size and get the cup size in order to get the bread Bowl price......long story short that is cheating POINT BLANK. Consumer beware!!!! $7.30 for a bowl of soup with no meat.....
Always great food, and it has been especially great with covid restrictions with curbside pickup.

Too expensive for what you get.  And now their signs tell you to order self-serve via kiosk.  Those are complicated and time consuming.  Not to mention poor customer service.  I don't want to pay premium prices and then have to also serve myself.  Bagels were cold and got my cteam cheese spread incorrect.
Very Busy at Lunchtime. Friendly staff.
Excelente
Clean and prompt service!

The location is convenient and nice inside. Staff seems to be a little all over the place. They are very friendly, so that's not an issue. But, ordering curbside pickup here is a nightmare and I've seen customers complain about their orders not being ready. They either 1) Bring it out 10 minutes later or 2) Leave it sitting inside for you to pick up (even though I definitely picked the curbside option). I go here often because it's convenient, but I always give myself extra time because you usually have to wait for quite a while. Recently,  I also ordered curbside and the parking lot was extremely full, so I had to park down the row towards the end. I saw the person come out with my order but they just looked at the cars right in front of the store (didn't see mine or even look down the row) and went back inside. I ended up just leaving because I was late to work.
Half of my pickup order was wrong, and no one is answering the phone, even during slow hours. No way to leave a message to get a manager to call back!
It's overrated.
Great service and clean environment.
My food was great!
Great people!!
I just like it.
Good food, great pastry but out of hazelnut coffee...our favorite.
Bread too hard
Good  food and  employees
Terrible service.

Unlike the Paneras I have visited in the past...including this location- better was the end of the visit than the beginning.  The order taker did not greet or smile!!! I always look for that! It actually looked like she may have been on extended overtime and needed to go home and sleep for 2 days. When I go back there and get her name I will include it in a future post.  Not to pick on her but to make her aware that EVERY customer is worth a decent greeting and a smile!

I have never eaten breakfast at Panera bread before so I came in this morning to meet some friends. The cashier, named Lizette, could not have been more helpful and friendly. The restaurant was extremely clean and quiet. It was the perfect place to have a really good breakfast.
Never disappointed with service or food. Real food!
I used to hate on Panera, but they have stepped it up! We went here for a quick lunch and it was great! Super easy to order ahead
Excellent pastries. Coffee lukewarm. Good service.
Excellent service
I like the french onion soup and the selection of coffee-based beverages they offer. The sandwiches are always consistently good.
Always good soup and sandwiches.
Good soup and salad
Would love vegan options
A very well run Panera location.
overpriced net worth it
Love Panera Bread.  Good food place!
My friend and I sat outside and had coffee and a danish. The fire pit was going and it created a nice atmosphere to "catch up". Thoroughly enjoyed it.
excellent place, the best that the food is healthy .very kind people.
Very cozy location
Good food but done priecy

Food came out cool, had to send back..to get it hot. Server not friendly.
Cashier was very nice!
Great customer service and delicious bakery goods!!
Even under construction the staff seemed really calm and friendly still. I enjoyed the staff being very helpful.

Got to bread bowl with Broccoli and cheese with a baguette.  Man that soup and bread was great. Quiznos cant even compete. Very filling for $7.03 will be coming back here for lunch again when I'm working around this location.
Super convenient lunch location just opposite the office parks. Love the tasty soups and sandwiches at Panera!
Extremely slow and apathetic service.  The worst Panera I ever ate at.
Tried again after months away, nothing changed: out of spinach artichoke souffle and hazelnut coffee at 7:30am.  Pathetic  mgmt!
Always delicious
Usually taste like it came out of a microwave. Not a lot of food for the price.
Food was great as usual.

This place was amazing!! The staff was patient with us being indecisive which occurs with us sometimes. Haha. Could not asked for a better experience from Panera Bread. Thank you for being amazing!!!!!!
Favorite place to go.

I've been frequenting this location for over 10 years now, and I don't think I've ever really experienced much of an issue.  If there is one, it is always dealt with swiftly.  The food is up to standards for a Panera Bread, and the location is very convenient for me.  Prices are a bit high, but no higher than other Panera locations.  All items, as well as the self serve soda fountain, are set out for customers, which takes away the burden of having to track down an employee to help with something minor.  Yet, staff is always responsive when needed.  Wait times are a bit long during lunch hour, but they do correspond to the amount of customers present, so this is understandable.  There is a nice screen near the to-go wait area that displays the order in which you may expect to be served, as well as how many people are ahead of you.

This was one of my favorite places, they have been very disappointing lately. My order was messed up several times and I was not given a special treat for their errors and the wait time in drive through is horrible and they are unapologetic for it. Cashier told me I am sorry, but it's just like that and I can't control it. When Charlene is there, the morning shift run smoother and never have I been in drive ten mins waiting when she is working.
I love the cold brewed Madagascar Vanilla
Fresh food

So, the manager of the restaurant told an employee to change the trash and leave for the day. The employee did change it and immediately started bringing food to customers tables without washing his hands, after dealing with the trash. I informed another employee, due to the fact that the manager always has an attitude and is unapproachable. Hope no one gets sick.
The Tuscan grilled chicken sandwich and Baja Mac and cheese as a pick 2 meal with an apple for the side is my new favorite choice for lunch. It's delicious!
My family, friends visit this location often. We gave never gotten the correct order and I hear a lot of cursing from the kitchen.

Got a 1/2 Modern Greek with Quinoa.
Cutting cheeses out of my diet,  I asked that it be left off.  They left it off, thank you.   However I asked for extra quinoa.   I don't think that the salad had a normal portion,  let alone extra.
When the food is served to your table, it's like 'here's your food'.  From a establishment as nice as Panera, I recommend that they step up the level of customer service.   A simple question, such as 'is there anything else we can get you?', or 'thank you for coming to Panera Bread, hope you enjoy your meal.'
It's so easy to evaluate the level of experience at any establishment,  yet very few do so.
Great egg souffle
Nice place, quality food, good service.

A nice location for lunch or picking up some baked goods, but a little hard to access off Fairview Road, a little tucked back in between the corporate buildings. Plenty clean and friendly staff, but can get busy during lunch hour near all those offices and minimal outdoor seating options. Food was up to standards for Panera quality. If this review was helpful, please consider liking.
The last visit the food was hot outside and cold in the middle.  Also, the value has slipped.  Serving sizes have gotten smaller, while prices have gone up.  Their soft drink prices are absurd.

I'm a fan of Panera, and this location does everything as you'd expect. Conceptually speaking, Panera has the reputation of being a healthy place to eat which just really isn't the case. But hey, the cinnamon bagels with the hazelnut cream cheese is delicious. Maybe I'm just doing it wrong...
